availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred J. Kennedy (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and constable. Nicholas County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Ann Hillock Kennedy In Nicholas County, Kentucky, on December 22, 1841. Father of William J. Kennedy, Mary S. Kennedy, Elizabeth F. Kennedy, John F. Kennedy, Harvey M. Kennedy, Winfield Scott Kennedy. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Constable in Nicholas County in 1861. Constable in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 413B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 91.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 9.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film# 000252403.
KYR-0001-017-0250.
